Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Mongrel \Mon"grel\, a. 1. (Zo["o]l.) Not of a pure breed. [1913 Webster]
2. Of mixed kinds; as, mongrel language. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mongrel \Mon"grel\, n. [Prob. shortened fr. mongrel, and akin to AS. mengan to mix, and E. mingle. See {Mingle}.] The progeny resulting from a cross between two breeds, as of domestic animals; anything of mixed breed. --Drayton. [1913 Webster]
